content.question: Which of the following is a primary function of the nervous system depicted in the figure?

choices.label: Breaking down food to process into energy
Sending and receiving sensory and motor signals
Receiving chemical signals from the outside world
Secreting hormones that regulate body temperature

content.answer: Sending and receiving sensory and motor signals

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
